Welcome to snscrape’s documentation!¶

class snscrape.modules.twitter.TwitterSearchScraper(query, cursor=None, top=False, **kwargs)¶

Scraper object, designed to scrape Twitter’s search results.

Parameters

  • query (str) – Search query.

  • cursor – cursor. Defaults to None.

  • top – top. Defaults to False.

Raises

ValueError – When query is empty.

Returns

Description of return stuff.
